```{r init}
rm(list=ls())
path = "E:/tax_incident/"
setwd(path)
library(plyr)
library(psych)
library(stargazer)
library(Matching)
library(sandwich)
library(ggplot2)
library(scales)
library(lubridate)
library(zoo)
library(AER)
output.type="text"

# source: All-Transactions House Price Index for California (CASTHPI) from https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CASTHPI
ca_hpi <- read.csv(file="CASTHPI.csv")
ca_hpi$DATE <- as.Date(as.character(ca_hpi$DATE))
ca_hpi <- ca_hpi[ca_hpi$DATE>"2000-01-01",]
ca_hpi['purchased_quarter'] <- as.yearqtr(ca_hpi$DATE)

fhfa_hpi <- read.csv(file="fhfa_hpi.csv")
fhfa_hpi <- fhfa_hpi[,1:3]
fhfa_hpi$date <- as.Date(as.character(fhfa_hpi$date))
fhfa_hpi['purchased_quarter'] <- as.yearqtr(fhfa_hpi$date)

listing_data <- readRDS(file="listing_data.rds")
listing_data['zip3']<- floor(listing_data$zip/100)
listing_data <- merge(listing_data,fhfa_hpi[,c("purchased_quarter","zip3","hpi")],all.x = TRUE, by=c("purchased_quarter","zip3"))
listing_data <- listing_data[listing_data$purchased_year>=1995,]


```

# Summary Stats
```{r summarystats}
stargazer(listing_data[, c("beds","baths","sqft","zest_value","avg_school_rating","avg_school_distance","age","Lot","Lastremodelyear","purchased_amount","listing_amount","ownership_years","purchased_year","listed_year","no_days_listed")], type = output.type, summary.stat = c("mean", "sd", "p25", "median", "p75", "n"),notes = "Houses sold in 2016")
```

# Listing Price Regression
```{r baseline}
formulas<-list()
formulas[[1]] <- as.formula("listing_amount~purchased_amount+factor(zip_listed_year)+beds+baths+sqft+avg_school_rating+factor(purchased_year)")
formulas[[2]] <- as.formula("listing_amount~purchased_amount+factor(zip_listed_year)+beds+baths+sqft+avg_school_rating+age+Lot+walk_score+factor(remodeled_before_listing)+factor(purchased_year)")
formulas[[3]] <- as.formula("listing_amount~purchased_amount+factor(zip_listed_year)+beds+baths+sqft+avg_school_rating+age+Lot+walk_score+factor(remodeled_before_listing)+zest_value+factor(zip_purchased_year)+factor(zip)+ownership_years")

ols <- list()
ols[[1]] <- lm(formulas[[1]],data = listing_data)
ols[[2]] <- lm(formulas[[2]],data = listing_data)
ols[[3]] <- lm(formulas[[1]],data = listing_data[listing_data$purchased_year>2005 & listing_data$purchased_year<=2012,])
ols[[4]] <- lm(formulas[[2]],data = listing_data[listing_data$purchased_year>2005 & listing_data$purchased_year<=2012,])
ols[[5]] <- lm(formulas[[3]],data = listing_data[listing_data$purchased_year>2005 & listing_data$purchased_year<=2012,])

se <- list()
for(i in 1:length(ols)) {
 se[[i]] <- sqrt(diag(vcovHC(ols[[i]], type = "HC1")))
}

stargazer(ols,omit = c("zip_listed_year","purchased_year","zip_purchased_year","zip"),omit.labels = c("zip * listed year","purchased year","zip purchased year","zip"),type=output.type,no.space = TRUE,omit.stat = c("f","rsq","ser"),notes= "Robust Standard Errors",column.labels = c("All years","All years","2005-2012","2005-2012"),multicolumn = TRUE,se=se)
```

# Two stage
```{r twostage}
formulas <- list()
formulas[[1]] <- as.formula("purchased_amount~factor(hpicat)+beds+baths+sqft+factor(purchased_year)+avg_school_rating+Lot+age+ownership_years")
formulas[[2]] <- as.formula("listing_amount~purchase_amt_hat+factor(zip_listed_year)+beds+baths+sqft+avg_school_rating+factor(remodeled_before_listing)+Lot+age+ownership_years+factor(purchased_year)")

temp <- listing_data[!is.na(listing_data$hpi) & !is.na(listing_data$purchased_amount) & !is.na(listing_data$beds) & !is.na(listing_data$baths) & listing_data$purchased_year>=2000 & !is.na(listing_data$purchased_year) & !is.na(listing_data$sqft) & !is.na(listing_data$avg_school_rating) & !is.na(listing_data$age) & !is.na(listing_data$Lot),]
temp['hpicat'] <- floor(temp$hpi/10)
ols <- list()
ols[[1]] <- lm(formulas[[1]],data = temp)
temp['purchase_amt_hat'] <- predict(object = ols[[1]])
ols[[2]] <- lm(formulas[[2]],data = temp)

# se <- list()
# for(i in 1:length(ols)) {
#  se[[i]] <- sqrt(diag(vcovHC(ols[[i]], type = "HC1")))
# }

stargazer(ols,omit = c("zip","zip_purchased_year","zip_listed_year","purchased_year","listed_year","hpicat"),type=output.type,no.space = TRUE,omit.stat = c("f","ser"),notes= "Robust Standard Errors",column.labels = c("First Stage"),multicolumn = TRUE)

#
```

# Listing Time
```{r listingtime}
formulas<-list()
formulas[[1]] <- as.formula("no_days_listed~log(purchased_amount)+factor(listed_year)+factor(zip)+log(zest_value)")
formulas[[2]] <- as.formula("no_days_listed~log(purchased_amount)+factor(listed_year)+factor(zip)+beds+baths+sqft+avg_school_rating+age+Lot+walk_score+factor(remodeled_before_listing)")

ols <- list()
ols[[1]] <- lm(formulas[[1]],data = listing_data[listing_data$purchased_year>2005 & listing_data$purchased_year<=2012 & is.finite(log(listing_data$purchased_amount)),])
ols[[2]] <- lm(formulas[[1]],data = listing_data[listing_data$purchased_year>2005 & listing_data$purchased_year<=2012 & is.finite(log(listing_data$purchased_amount))& listing_data$listing_end_type=="sale",])
ols[[3]] <- lm(formulas[[2]],data = listing_data[listing_data$purchased_year>2005 & listing_data$purchased_year<=2012 & is.finite(log(listing_data$purchased_amount)),])
ols[[4]] <- lm(formulas[[2]],data = listing_data[listing_data$purchased_year>2005 & listing_data$purchased_year<=2012 & is.finite(log(listing_data$purchased_amount))& listing_data$listing_end_type=="sale",])


se <- list()
for(i in 1:length(ols)) {
 se[[i]] <- sqrt(diag(vcovHC(ols[[i]], type = "HC1")))
}

stargazer(ols,omit = c("zip","listed_year"),omit.labels = c("zip","listed year"),type=output.type,no.space = TRUE,omit.stat = c("f","rsq","ser"),notes= "Robust Standard Errors and purchase year in (2005,2012)",se=se,column.labels = c("All Listing","Sold Listing","All Listing","Sold Listing"),multicolumn = TRUE)
```

# Listing End Type
```{r listingend}
formulas<-list()
formulas[[1]] <- as.formula("failed_listing~log(purchased_amount)+ownership_years+factor(listed_year)+factor(zip)+log(zest_value)")
formulas[[2]] <- as.formula("successful_listing~log(purchased_amount)+ownership_years+factor(listed_year)+factor(zip)+log(zest_value)")

ols <- list()
ols[[1]] <- lm(formulas[[1]],data = listing_data[listing_data$purchased_year>2005 & listing_data$purchased_year<=2012 & is.finite(log(listing_data$purchased_amount)),])
ols[[2]] <- lm(formulas[[2]],data = listing_data[listing_data$purchased_year>2005 & listing_data$purchased_year<=2012 & is.finite(log(listing_data$purchased_amount)),])


se <- list()
for(i in 1:length(ols)) {
 se[[i]] <- sqrt(diag(vcovHC(ols[[i]], type = "HC1")))
}

stargazer(ols,omit = c("zip","listed_year"),omit.labels = c("zip","listed year"),type=output.type,no.space = TRUE,omit.stat = c("f","rsq","ser"),notes= "Robust Standard Errors and purchase year in (2005,2012)",se=se,column.labels = c("Pr(failiure)","Pr(success)"),multicolumn = TRUE)
```
